channel.title: I want to sync shop keeper with shop
channel.description: i really need to make a shop, i spawned a shopkeeper, but when i trade him i get disconnected, how do i sync him with a shop?

item.title: I want to sync shop keeper with shop
item.dc:creator: @JadeScape JadeScape
item.description:
@JadeScape wrote:

Ok (hope im not doing this for nothing…)

Ok So when you spawn him it wont work like did you do like this
(example)
::npc 50
(im not saying that you did that type of npc thou)

If you did it that way you are waaaaaaaayyyyyyyyy off trying to make a shop this is how you do it::

Step:1 Go to C:/ drive

Step:2 Got to Programfiles

Step:3 Search in that file for Moparscape (not running the game)

Step:4 after opening Moparscape (not running the game)
go to Hybridscape which is in the the folder Moparscape

Step:5 after opening Hybridscape
go to autospawn and open it as Notepad

step:6
In side the file will look like this
spawn = 494 3256 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 NPC

(numb and letter code info)
Spawn = ID HERE Xcoord Ycoord DontChange RangeX1 RangeY1
RangeX1 RangeX2 walktype Discription Of the Npc
(numb and letter code info)

So you put In
Spawn = Right here put the id
Then
The Xcoord
Then
the Ycoord
then
have the rest like this
0 0 0 0 0 2 MyshopKeeper1

Then Save your work
then play

How to get X and Y coord

Open Moparscape ( run the game )
Login
Walk to the area you want him to be
press F4
then where the X and Y coords need to be in the file put them where they are sopost to be…

Read full topic
